snippet: Repairs to the Washington Monument, damaged by an earthquake in August, may keep it closed into 2014, the National Park Service said Monday.
abstract: National Park Service says that repairs to the Washington Monument, damaged by an earthquake in August 2011, may keep it closed into 2014.
lead_paragraph: Repairs to the Washington Monument, damaged by an earthquake in August, may keep it closed into 2014, the National Park Service said Monday.

headline.main: Washington Monument May Stay Closed Until 2014
headline.print_headline: Washington Monument May Stay Closed Until 2014
